title: Wyvern's Trim and Other Stories
description: A selection of short stories about dragons finding their mates. Set in a world where history has been completely changed because dragons have invaded the Earth. There is peace now with dragons and humans having signed a treaty. Things changed because the dragons realised that they could mate with humans and this brought humans off the menu and into their lives. Of course there is still cultural and species interactions that are confusing and amusing. This is a series of short stories about these interactions between dragons and the women they have chosen to be their mates.
author: Nix Whittaker
